text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
——Suu... Fuu... 
Bonjour... Un café, s'il vous plaît...

text_block_list.name: Café Staff
text_block_list.text: Understood.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Bueno!! Cafe-senpai, you did it! Nice French!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Sakura Laurel-sensei must be applauding you from Japan! Très bien♪

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
Thank you. I’m glad I did a bit of studying before our trip.
Such a pleasant aroma, I’m going to go watch their roasting process.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty then, it’s my turn! I’ll use the 
power that Laurel-senpai praised me for!

text_block_list.name: Café Staff
text_block_list.text: Ah, next customer, please.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Umm! Ange! D'range! S'il vous plaît!

text_block_list.name: Café Staff
text_block_list.text: Orange juice, Understood.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It actually worked! They were able to understand my French!

text_block_list.name: Café Staff？
text_block_list.text: Oui, yakisoba bonjour!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huuuh?! Golshi-san?!

text_block_list.name: French Customer
text_block_list.text: Bon Gold Ship! The order isn't ready yet!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Shut it! Can't you at least come up with some witty sarcasm?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Oh! Old man, did your paintings sell? ...Oh, that's good! 
There’s a whole lotta people here today, huh? Share some tips!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: She fits in so perfectly... I won’t fall behind!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I think she’s fitting in too much, like she’s actually Parisian!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: But something feels off. This feeling... something’s—

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: It’s showtime!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I knew it! It’s Tap-senpai!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Wow, she’s so elegant. She’s flowing like the Seine River♪

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: —Hah!!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: ...And... Finished!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
That was simply a mere greeting!
Now to the main topic... I’m scouting you!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
I came to this place to chase a grand dream! 
Win big or lose everything...a truly outrageous dream, is it not?!

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Well, how about it? A truly compelling prospect, no? 
Those who feel fired up are all welcome! 
Come on board the ship of pursuit!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text: I’m in.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text: Nakayama-san?! When did you get here?!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
I couldn’t miss this. 'Lose everything,' huh? 
Like all your assets, reputation, dignity... everything, right? 
Is that really okay with you?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
If it wasn’t there'd be no point in risking it, right? 
I completely agree with that philosophy! 
Earning little by little isn't my thing, I'm after the big win!

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Heh, I can get with that. But we're not allies, 
and we won’t be sharing the spoils, got it?

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text: But of course! Now then, who else wants to join us?!

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Oh, I’d like to join too! If it’s to fulfill a difficult dream... 
I'll stake the pride of the Satono family and take the challenge head on!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Alrighty then! Romance and strength! 
I’ll be the ship’s captain! We’re gonna be pirates!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Okay, but don’t forget to drop me off on the way home! 
It’s a little far in a place called Versailles, but that’ll be 
fine, right? Anyway, let’s set sail☆

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
The sound and aroma of the roasted beans...is so calming. 
Umm, when you’re getting ready to leave you should say—

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
"Merci". That alone should be enough. 
Yo, Cafe. What a coincidence.

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
You're about to leave, right? Then I'll give you a ride. 
We're heading to the same place after all...

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text: Monte à bord! Do you enjoy flying amongst the clouds?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ah, we finally found you, Cafe-senpai... 
Wait, what's with that expression? 
You look like you just downed a glass of salsa vida!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Wow, she really does! Want some menthe à l'eau? 
I’ll even throw in a manjiro as a Golshi Special In Paris bonus.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I’m fine. I just got off of a small plane
 where the pilot was very...playful.

text_block_list.name: Satono Diamond
text_block_list.text:
Oh, did you happen to ride on Sirius-san’s plane?! 
I’m so jealous... I would love to one day be 
allowed to ride on her plane as well...

text_block_list.name: Nakayama Festa
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, the young lady's eyes are gleaming, Sirius. 
I’m also interested in seeing how you handle your 
plane... So you gonna shoot us an invite?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
Comme tu veux. Seems like everything 
is ready. Isn’t that right, Tap?

text_block_list.name: Sirius Symboli
text_block_list.text:
But there sure are a lot of girls with tricks up their sleeves. 
That's why this will be an interesting match... 
But nonetheless, I'll be the only one to rise to the top.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Now that’s the spirit, Sirius! That’s why 
I like you! You’re pursuing the same dream 
with such incredible individuals... Fantastic.

text_block_list.name: Tap Dance City
text_block_list.text:
Now let’s start the adventure! 
It’ll be a huge, impulsive, blazing hot adventure!
